row.question: If an electricity bill is paid before due date, one gets a reduction of 4 % on the amount of the bill. By paying the bill before due date, a person got a reduction of 13 . The amount of his electricity bill was
row.rationale:
Let amount of electricity bill = N
∴ 4% of N = 13
(4 x N)/100 = 13
N = 13 x 25 = 325
ANSWER :C
